scenario_1.persona_desc: A network administrator who specializes in the use of various protocols for connecting and communicating between different points on a network. They are familiar with the different types of protocols and their functions, including ASYNC.LINK, MARS-A, MDU, MININET, MODBUS, S-BUS, COMLI, and PR2000. They have experience in implementing and configuring these protocols, as well as troubleshooting and maintaining network connectivity. They are also familiar with the protocols' error checking and transmission functions, including the use of protocols like RDS and MARS-A. They have experience working with different types of network equipment and software, and are able to troubleshoot and resolve network connectivity issues.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is Right. Even though A gets more, I still get $400, which is the same as the Left option.
